Text: Atogwo ñw omi! Todu u dabe̩ne̩
E̩ne̩ ki akpe̩do̩rʼo̩jo̩ lenyo̩ bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩ me̩,
Ma nʼo̩wo̩ meji ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩, o̩wo̩-ma le̩ aya;
E̩ne̩ ki nyo̩ tʼuma le ef uma dab ikeke,
E̩ ki dʼo̩la ekeji-we̩ rʼochochi n,
todu o̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ achʼata-wñ e̩de̩te̩,
I muda chʼe-mi, nakejuru Jihofa,
E̩ ki gwoye rʼumi oji n, O e̩nebi-mi;
Omi ane̩ e̩do̩ e̩kpa e-Jihofa
Tak e̩nebi-mi aliʼi,
O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩do̩-we̩ awa!
Iko le̩ ma akwo Asiria gbogbo wʼewo ewo Ijipti
Ane̩ le̩ muda achʼalache̩ te̩
Nʼo̩kpa-we̩ dejutʼabo-we̩,
Alu ki de̩ iko kʼe̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ali oñ anyo̩ ugbiti e-ma chaka amu ma;
ma afʼebutu na dab ejo,
E̩ne̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki dab uwe̩, kʼi atʼudu kʼone̩ fe̩ no̩?
I arida, i la adabi lʼuwa ejumoni,
Uwe̩ adʼochochi ña Jeko̩b
